# Meet Our Team

## Davis Sato– Head Brewer
Davis brings over 10 years of brewing experience, specializing in IPAs and stouts. He ensures every batch meets our high-quality standards.

## Matthew Fleet – Marketing & Sales
Matthew manages marketing campaigns and customer engagement, sharing our passion for craft beer with the community.

## Taya Gannon – Operations Manager
Taya oversees production schedules and logistics, making sure our brewery runs smoothly every day.

## Julia MacLachlan – Quality Control & Tasting
Julia guarantees that every beer meets taste and quality standards before reaching customers.
